item.title: Delivering digital services by 2025
item.description: In September 2018, the Digital Industries Table — part of Canada’s Economic Strategy Tables and made up of a dozen Canadian business leaders — published a report titled The Innovation and Competitiveness Imperative: Seizing Opportunities for Growth. The report pointedly issued this challenge to the Government of Canada: Digitize all public-facing government services so they are accessible by web and mobile phone and available behind a unified login system by 2025.
